name: Why Bob?!
description:
Bob is a cleaning robot, help him clean the mess his owners left behind.
Move Bob to put the trash in the can. But you can use one specific key only once. Assign your moves so you can accomplish your task succesfully. Be careful not to run out of keys!

Keyboard keys are a precious ressource, you’ll have to manage them well to win.

You can restart the level with the R key, hold down to restart the entire game.
